title: Unable to connect to server
body:
I couldnt get into a game that just got into loading screen- it just went to a black screen then says unable to connect to the server. One of the other team's players were also dced and just when I was able to reconnect (had to use cellular) they reconnected too..?

Tried a custom game after but it still doesnt work :/

Anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=koreoes,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ZL28vEuJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-08T06:35:10.616+0000)
>
> I couldnt get into a game that just got into loading screen- it just went to a black screen then says unable to connect to the server. One of the other team's players were also dced and just when I was able to reconnect (had to use cellular) they reconnected too..?
> 
> Tried a custom game after but it still doesnt work :/
> 
> Anyone else experiencing this?


Edit: wow just when I posted it started to work. If anyone else experiences this just wait it out I guess, or use mobile hotspot and connect :)
